column8: http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...-crash-victims/Johor Umno appoints legal firm to assist bicycle crash victimsBernama | May 6, 2017Party allocates RM350,000 to cover legal cost and medical treatment for 8 teens injured in the incident, which occurred at 3amJOHOR BAHRU: Johor Umno has appointed legal firm Messrs Meneka Kanasmoorthy to assist the families of the 16 young victims involved in an accident during a cycling outing here in February, to take legal action.State Umno liaison chairman Mohamed Khaled Nordin said the party had allocated RM350,000 to cover the legal cost and medical treatment for eight of the teenagers who were injured in the incident.A mock cheque for the allocation was handed over to the legal firm’s representative, Mohd Nor Zabidin, at a Johor Umno Liaison Committee meeting here today.Khaled, who is also Johor Menteri Besar, said this was part of efforts to help the families of the accident victims.Meanwhile, Mohd Nor said the legal process would start next week.In the early morning incident on the Middle Ring Road on Feb 18, eight of the cycling teenagers, aged between 13 and 17, were killed, while another eight were injured, when they were hit by a car driven by a woman.The driver, Sam Ke Ting, a 21-year-old saleswoman, has claimed trial for dangerous and reckless driving.She was charged under Section 42(1) of the Road Transport Act 1987 and was released on bail.
rm350k, rm300k goes to lawyer's pocket.
clever to appoint legal firm which is owned by indian?
350k for 8 future hardcore supporter bonus immediate friends and family votes.money well spent!
Nak Harapkan PH.. satu sen pun tak nampak..at least BN/UMNO give mock check.. Can use it as firewood.. owai
What kind of message Umno sending?

column7: From: Malaysia, UNITED STATES OF ASIA
column8: How much can a 21 years old flat chested amoi pay to all the victim? Even if she prostitute herself in order to cover the losses still it cannot match the value or each victim? Can you set a price tag of each victim? They are not Mackerel dishes to begin with. They are priceless. Normally when you lost your priceless one, what you do? You set a price tag? No! You forgive and forget and stay away from stupid friends. Remind your children to choose the right friend. If they have to be lonely because of no good friends around, it is your duty to find a good neighborhood for your children to mix around and develop their character. You don't just have sex and let loose. Marriage ain't like that. It is a responsibility. If kampung is suitable for your children upbringing, move to kampung. The beloved Prophet MPBUH also was brought up in a kampung environment, fresh air, less stress, fresh food, big land, lovely people and most importantly cheaper.

typical of easily manipulated racist idiots350k to win a legal casewhat is their end game? so she ends up in prison and ruin another life?gotta so prescon then mock cheaque and showcase the world big big they take action?isn't 350k better put to use to carry out projects and activities that will harness this bicycle culture in a proper way then being used to sue a girl but it won't fix the problem it just seems to be polishing the shoes of a certain aspect of society.
